channel.title: [iClarity] Some major bug fixes and some features added
channel.description:
Well, I was hoping to make this my main project, but I am very busy lately and am probably going to go ahead and mainly program c# applications, so if this is a halt in my project I misewell release the bit I did. I'm giving most credit to Primadude for creating iClarity. I really don't care if you flame me because I will most likely not even look at this topic ever again. So if you want to say something PM it to me. I will also release the client but all I really did was fix the about button so I give Prima all credits for the client.
A few things I did: [code] Bugs fixed: Invisible glitch 2h with shield glitch Trade scam glitch Arrow ammount suggestion [190 arrows on loggin] Teleport animation Blood rune withdraw Restart set location -1 -1 Theving level 99 crash Range npc in fightcaves still attack you after you die
Features added: Runecrafting Repackaged Members [/code]
Features included before I made changes: [quote="Primadude, post:1, topic:289141"][U][B](¯`·._.· Server updates between V1 and V1.05 ·._.·´¯):[/B][/U]
[ul][li]Found and fixed a fault, which caused the server to take up a lot more Memory Usage than the server should do.[/li] [li]Fixed bug: Magic tabs.[/li] [li]Fixed bug: You couldn't see players after you died.[/li] [li]Fixed bug: Granite maul special attack.[/li] [li]Fixed bug: Wilderness skull not disappearing after leaving wilderness.[/li] [li]Fixed bug: NPC drops.[/li] [li]Fixed bug: Wilderness levels in duel arena.[/li] [li]Fixed bug: Client crashing.[/li] [li]Removed: Lunar interface.[/li] [li]Increased Stability; Uses 3x less CPU now.[/li] [li]Handled all packets.[/li] [li]Handled NPC combat.[/li] [li]Handled Leather Crafting.[/li] [li]Handled Minigames.[/li] [li]Fixed logging in glitch.[/li] [li]Removed a lot of unnecessary codes.[/li] [li]Based in Edgeville.[/li] [li]PvN magic.[/li] [li]Finished: Barrows.[/li] [li]Shops in edgeville include: Crafting shop, general store (All shops will be added in V1.1).[/li] [li]Crafting added. Includes Full leather crafting (Gem cutting & amulet creation will be added in V1.1).[/li] [li]Full skulling added: You attack someone, you skull; they attack you back, they don't skull. You also lose all items if you are skulled and you don't have protect item on, if you die.[/li] [li]More use of events, and less 'processing' used.[/li] [li]Tzhaar NPC teleports you to fight cave entrance.[/li] [li]Warrior in edgeville (Is going to be used for teleportation to the warriors guild, and the skillcape shop).[/li] [li]Vannaka (Slayer master) in edgeville will give you tasks, and has the slayer shop.[/li] [li]Find the rest for yourself.[/li][/ul][/quote]
I am [b]NOT[/b] going to post pictures because the gameplay is pretty much blank so there is no point.
Here are the downloads: Server source code: [url=http://uppit.com/v/TWKO993A]Server source code. Click here.[/url] Client source code: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?wnndmj3mgnn]Client source code. Click here[/url]
I don't care if you download or post, because Prima is probably going to release iClarity v2 and it will mop the floor with this.

item.title: [iClarity] Some major bug fixes and some features added
item.dc:creator: @WAFFLE2 WAFFLE-
item.description:
@WAFFLE2 wrote:

masterkorv12:

Ummm Ziplock why does it come i cant compile even when ive changed the jdk to mine, i still cant compile! heeelp

to compile, get a working compiler go to edit copy everything in the notepad. exit out of it. go to the broken compiler. and delete what it sais, and paste the working compiler in the notepad, save and then use it.

Read full topic

item.title: [iClarity] Some major bug fixes and some features added
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

Well, I was hoping to make this my main project, but I am very busy lately and am probably going to go ahead and mainly program c# applications, so if this is a halt in my project I misewell release the bit I did. I’m giving most credit to Primadude for creating iClarity. I really don’t care if you flame me because I will most likely not even look at this topic ever again. So if you want to say something PM it to me. I will also release the client but all I really did was fix the about button so I give Prima all credits for the client.

A few things I did:

Bugs fixed:
Invisible glitch
2h with shield glitch
Trade scam glitch
Arrow ammount suggestion [190 arrows on loggin]
Teleport animation
Blood rune withdraw
Restart set location -1 -1
Theving level 99 crash
Range npc in fightcaves still attack you after you die


Features added:
Runecrafting
Repackaged
Members

Features included before I made changes:

[quote=“Primadude, post:1, topic:289141”](¯`·..· Server updates between V1 and V1.05 ·..·´¯):

[ul][li]Found and fixed a fault, which caused the server to take up a lot more Memory Usage than the server should do.[/li]
[li]Fixed bug: Magic tabs.[/li]
[li]Fixed bug: You couldn’t see players after you died.[/li]
[li]Fixed bug: Granite maul special attack.[/li]
[li]Fixed bug: Wilderness skull not disappearing after leaving wilderness.[/li]
[li]Fixed bug: NPC drops.[/li]
[li]Fixed bug: Wilderness levels in duel arena.[/li]
[li]Fixed bug: Client crashing.[/li]
[li]Removed: Lunar interface.[/li]
[li]Increased Stability; Uses 3x less CPU now.[/li]
[li]Handled all packets.[/li]
[li]Handled NPC combat.[/li]
[li]Handled Leather Crafting.[/li]
[li]Handled Minigames.[/li]
[li]Fixed logging in glitch.[/li]
[li]Removed a lot of unnecessary codes.[/li]
[li]Based in Edgeville.[/li]
[li]PvN magic.[/li]
[li]Finished: Barrows.[/li]
[li]Shops in edgeville include: Crafting shop, general store (All shops will be added in V1.1).[/li]
[li]Crafting added. Includes Full leather crafting (Gem cutting & amulet creation will be added in V1.1).[/li]
[li]Full skulling added: You attack someone, you skull; they attack you back, they don’t skull. You also lose all items if you are skulled and you don’t have protect item on, if you die.[/li]
[li]More use of events, and less ‘processing’ used.[/li]
[li]Tzhaar NPC teleports you to fight cave entrance.[/li]
[li]Warrior in edgeville (Is going to be used for teleportation to the warriors guild, and the skillcape shop).[/li]
[li]Vannaka (Slayer master) in edgeville will give you tasks, and has the slayer shop.[/li]
[li]Find the rest for yourself.[/li][/ul][/quote]

I am NOT going to post pictures because the gameplay is pretty much blank so there is no point.

Here are the downloads:
Server source code:
Server source code. Click here.
Client source code:
Client source code. Click here

I don’t care if you download or post, because Prima is probably going to release iClarity v2 and it will mop the floor with this.

Read full topic
